products.title: Addict Terrazzo Grey Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Addict terrazzo grey roller blind in grey/black. Made to measure from 15.46 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
The perfect blend of function and style, the addict terrazzo roller blind will help you make the most of your living space. This polyester fabric roller blind allows you to control the natural light levels in the room whilst providing a chic decorative touch. This artistic blend of cool greys is certainly eye-catching with a distinct urban vibe.
 
 Product id: sdb-rbx2004 fabric colour: terrazo grey material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes

products.title: Addict Soleil Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Addict soleil roller blind in grey/yellow. Made to measure from 15.46 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Influenced by watercolour, this hazy abstract design will bring an artistic touch to your window. The daubs of golden yellow give warmth to the contrasting grey hues, making this moody motif a stylish complement for modern interiors. The addict soleil roller blind will work well alongside greys with yellow or brown-beige undertones and accents of yellow and mustard.
 
 Product id: sdb-rbx1949 fabric colour: soleil material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes

products.title: Addict Terrazzo Grey Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Addict terrazzo grey electric roller blind in grey/black. Made to measure from 156.35 with free uk mainland delivery. This electric roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
The pico mustard roller blind has a warm and sunny appeal with a twist of retro style that will look great teamed with rich jewel tones and mid-century furnishings. The smart geometric print of white triangles is printed on mustard coloured, pollergen treated fabric that will give enhanced comfort in your home or work space.
 
 Product id: db-erbx2004 fabric colour: terrazo grey material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: electric control battery powered energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes

products.title: Addict Soleil Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Addict soleil electric roller blind in grey/yellow. Made to measure from 156.35 with free uk mainland delivery. This electric roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
This modern and moody print will bring a touch of abstract art to your window and is a great way carry the key colours from your scheme. Made from quality polyester fabric, the addict soleil electric roller blind is hassle free addition to your home thanks to the electric mechanism that lowers and raises the blind. Now you can tastefully decorate tricky to reach windows too.
 
 Product id: db-erbx1949 fabric colour: soleil material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: electric control battery powered energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes
